name: Between Planes
description:
Between Planes is a heavily inspired Oregon Trail type of game but the variation lies in our world environment. Instead of settlers trying to get to California, our game takes place in a fantastical world known as Sybil - a world split and governed by 4 elemental pantheons. 

The player starts in the frosty realm of Nevermelt and must escort four villagers to safety. This game was developed for the class Informatics 125 at UC Irvine.

Learn more here! https://sdanly.wixsite.com/between-planes

[THIS GAME IS VERY INCOMPLETE/IN DEVELOPMENT]
